Text: RE Big Johnon the young Michael That must be fantasticmy fiance is from Houston and we go up to Spring periodically to visit her folks and I would love to hook up with you and the family if possible on one of those tripsyes it is a common problem for traders my dad eventually demoted himself back to the action I think he said something about executive management draining the life blood from his veins I am spending a lot of time in Detroit on our latest acquisitionit is looking like another home runI will attach the press release Congrats on all the successes I am glad things are so well for you Best regards Ross Original Message From To Sent PM Subject RE Big John Whats up Ross To your questions Yes to Houston Yes to Enron Almost to running the company although Im thinking about demoting myself I miss trading Married one child Michael Give me a call if your in Houston and well have a few drinks John Lavorato President and Chief Executive Officer Enron Americas Original Message From Ross Gatlin ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESRossGatlinCrgatlincmgtxEcomE NRONcom Sent Wednesday May AM To Subject Big John John baby What are you up to Are you in Houston If so we should touch base some point Still with Enron Do you run the company yet Are you responsible for my pricing at the pump I have been back in Dallas since and am working with The Carlyle Groupgetting married in Augustyou Hope all is well Best regards Ross Founding Partner Carlyle Management Group Crescent Court Suite Dallas TX C W CMG AcquisitionKey Plasticsdoc
